title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message:
the MacBook came with display lines, the customer needs to change display
after changed with new display, macbook does not starting 
when I connected to another Macbook using c port and apple configurator it shows recovery-mode
I tried dfu mode and used revive device first nothing happened it stopped with an error
then I tried restore n DFU mode several times but still nothing happened some time it stucks in installing device
and some times it stops with error

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Did you disconnect the battery, before touching J8500 connector?
Disconnect internal LCD and check for image on external monitor.

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message:
yes I do 
before changing display disconnected battery
I checked without display but the same 
I connected old Lined display still same
not checked using external monitor will check

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message: When machine appears in AC2 as in recovery, force it off and try to put in DFU mode.

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message: YES DONE IT. used dfu mode to restore

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message: yes I used dfu to restore but still stops with error 4014

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message:
Caps Lock light reacts, when press the key?
Tested external video?

Just in case, try DFU with internal LCD disconnected.

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message:
thanks sir
 I checked using external monitor and disconnected internal lvds
got it completed dfu

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message:
thank u so much for helping
am Arjun from Kozhikode -Kerala- Inida
am doing laptop chip level service including apple from 2012
thank u

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message:
have a question 
why this happened ? is the display (new one) bad

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message:
Glad to hear the problem was fixed.
And thanks for solution feedback; other people may find it useful.

No idea why MacBooks get some weird issues.
Just know Apple made garbage since 2016...

title: MacBook a1989 in recovery mode
message: Just feedback. I had a similar error which was preventing restore or revive. Turn out to be a faulty camera module
